# Project Instructions

This is a React + TypeScript monorepo using Vite, pnpm workspaces, ESLint, and Prettier.

## Structure
- `packages/authorization` - Authorization workspace
- `packages/core` - Core workspace  
- `packages/app` - Main application workspace

## Tech Stack
- React 18
- TypeScript
- Vite
- pnpm workspaces
- ESLint + Prettier
